FuncDef:
The monitor enable command enables the monitoring capability of an L2VPN monitoring group.
The undo monitor enable command disables the monitoring capability of an L2VPN monitoring group.
By default, the monitoring capability of an L2VPN monitoring group is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable the monitoring capability of an L2VPN monitoring group, run the monitor enable command. An L2VPN monitoring group can be bound to protocol VSI PWs only after the monitoring capability is enabled.
Prerequisites
An L2VPN monitoring group has been created.
